QuestData.Title: Trouble on the Western Front
QuestData.Description:
The Ashbringer and your fellow Maldraxxi need reinforcements at the western gate. They are barely holding on!
Xandria and my kin will reinforce our position here and push forward towards Gharmal. We must make haste to Mograine--without both flanks, we cannot hope to achieve victory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Kynthia to report to Alexandros at the Stitchyard.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Mograine at the Stitchyard.
QuestData.RewardText: I am glad Kynthia found you so quickly.
